note.p: Paymaster of the Forces. Freemason, of un-named Lodge No 37 at Rummer, Henrietta Street, London,
Notes: Proposed by General [ie Sir Francis] Nicholson; Martin Folkes. Death date may be for a different individual
'Freemasons and the Royal Society: Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010. Library and Museum of Freemasonry, page 3
